meanings: [명사] doubt, question, suspicion, [동사] doubt (that), be doubtful (about/that/whether/if), suspect (that), be suspicious (of/about), question

설마 아직도 오빠 의심하는 거야? Are you still doubting me? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 친구 남친 바람 말한다 VS 모른척 한다 [엑스엑스(XX)] - EP.06
뭐냐? 이 의심스러운 스멜은? What is this? It's suspicious. 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 요즘 너만 보면 자꾸 커진단 말이야 [리얼:타임:러브2] EP3

vlive.english: [Doubtful] Why do you invite one by one?

examples.korean: He did his best to avert suspicion. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 의심을 피하기 위해 최선을 다했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He did his best to avert suspicion. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She began to harbour doubts about the decision. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 그 결정에 대해 의심을 품기 시작했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She began to harbour doubts about the decision. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She had niggling doubts about their relationship. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 그들의 관계에 대해 자꾸 의심이 들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She had niggling doubts about their relationship. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She has an undoubted talent as an organizer. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 조직자로서 의심할 여지없는 재능을 지니고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She has an undoubted talent as an organizer. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The correctness of this decision may be doubted. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 결정의 적절성이 의심을 받을 수도 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The correctness of this decision may be doubted. Add to Wordbook
